segments.text: I've come to apologize for what I said yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t think any more about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I must make an apology for losing my temper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s really not necessary . I know your intention was good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m relieved to hear that . Anyway , it ’ s my fault .
segments.speaker: S1
